name: The Hallway (Poppamunz)
description:
A high schooler, feeling anxious and a bit guilty about someone who wants to go with him to prom, asks the player for advice. (Contains multiple endings!)

Writing and sprites by Poppamunz

Made for the Toadhouse Visual Novel Game Jam 2021

Music used: "Almost Bliss," "Merry Go Slower," and "Wallpaper" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com), licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
